I got a medium, 5’2, 140 lbs. it’s very comfortable. Could have worn a small. It’s super soft and my favorite sweater! Quality is amazing!
super soft. im 5'3 and its a little big but i love it.

These sweaters seem to be like something you would find at the Buckle. I was pleasantly surprised at the soft material and they drape nicely. The small looks oversized on me as I could definitely use an extra small. I am attaching images of 4 different colors. The black is definitely not as shown in the image! The other colors were a decent match. One thing I will mention too is that sizing is inconsistent.  The sleeves on some of these are super long and go past the tips of my fingers.

评论详情: Lots of compliments
I bought this for my mother in law and it looks so nice on her. She loved the color and the way it fit.

I spent a long time debating whether to buy this cardigan. In some of the photos, it looks cheap. But in person, it’s super soft and almost seems like alpaca wool. It also fits really nicely. The colors are not as expected — the khaki is missing the orange contrast stripes, which was one of the aspects that drew me to this sweater… but it’s still cute.  I was concerned about putting it in the dryer to get the creases out from being folded during shipping (seen in my photo), but I put it in the dryer on low and it came out fluffed up and mostly wrinkle free — also super static-y. I don’t think I’ll put it in the dryer after washing but when it’s dry it seems to do just fine.
The colors are so pretty and it's really thick and warm. I get so many compliments when I wear this sweater!
I love the length of this sweater but wish it was made from natural materials such as cotton or wool but it is warm and cozy.
I love the way this fits. It’s very comfortable very soft and definitely will buy more later.

评论概述: I absolutely love this sweater!  The colors are awesome.  Just the right length!
评论详情: I absolutely love this sweater!  The colors are awesome and it is just the right length.  Goes great with my blue dress and brown boots!  I would definitely buy again!
I love this sweater, it was better than I expected. It’s very soft and thick enough to stay  warm. The only thing I wish it had, was pockets!

Love the colors and design. Very comfortable and cute! Only negative I have is that it picks easily. It catches on sharp items like a long fingernail or buckle. It pulled a few long threads out. I was able to trim them off, but watch carefully when wearing to avoid picking. Don’t buy if you are clumsy like me! I will wear carefully.

评论用户: Oh I really love it… I’m a big Lynyrd Skynyrd fan and this T-shirt is awesome!
评论详情: I got the brown one and it is great!  Warm but not too hot.  Looks great with jeans and boots.  Getting lots of compliments!

I had buy more!  Love this material! Love the vibe of this look!
This is so pretty! I was stopped 2 times in the Philadelphia airport saying they loved my sweater! A recent trip to the grocery store got my sweater another compliment.

It's exactly as pictured . It's very soft and beautiful.
I have purchased this for a Christmas present.  The quality and sizing seem good.  However,  the color and pattern of the sweater do not match the picture at all.  I may be returning this item.

评论概述: I love all the color choices! It was hard to decide!
评论详情: I bought the black one because I figured it was neutral to wear with just about anything. It is very comfy and warm, and I get ton's of compliments. In all honesty, I like the black, but wish I would have gotten one with more color, mostly just because I tend to wear colors and not black so much. However, the black does go with just about everything. If you are thinking about it, get it! It is well-made, warm, and very trendy and fashionable.

I really do like this sweater but washing it is a nightmare. The fibers come out and attaches to every piece of clothing and lint catcher in the dryer. The fringe at the bottom gets all tangled up after washing. Meanwhile, I bought another pattern from the same company and it’s completely different fabric.
Seems to be good quality- not cheap junk. Flattering & fun!
I love this sweater!  It makes me feel so groooovy, and as I lose weight, it will still fit me.  I look forrward to wearing it for a long time.

评论概述: Sleeves sewn on inside out - twice!
评论详情: I would have kept this sweater - the color and pattern were lovely - except for the fact that the sleeves were attached inside out, and the neck seam was also a knotted mess on the outside of the sweater. Someone paid zero attention to crafting this item. Too bad.  Update: I was sent a replacement, and the sleeves were sewn inside out and backwards on this one as well. Cheap garbage.
Love this cardigan, color, length, and the fringe.

I was worried when I ordered it that I wouldn’t like the pattern or tassels but I wanted something this length and needed it quickly. I love this sweater! I’ve gotten so many compliments. It’s warm and soft and goes with a lot of things. The sleeves are a little long on me but I roll them either over or under or push the sleeves up and it’s fine. The only thing that could make this sweater better would be pockets. I would really love if it had pockets.

This thing is beautiful and so incredibly soft and comfy... I want to wear it all the time! I got a compliment the other day at an outdoor party where the guy said "That's really nice. It looks like something my wife should have." So I sent him the link! It really is super soft and warm...I wish it had a snap or something to close it and pockets, but it's so comfortable I can overlook that!

Get constant compliments even after a year. Wash on delicate in cold and hang dry
Wonderful sweater, so soft and warm.

评论概述: Bohemian Cardigan Sweater with Tassel Fringe Accents
评论详情: This cardigan is great for fall! Not too thick and not too lightweight. It runs big, size down. I’m wearing a small. Great quality. I liked it so much, I bought it in cream too. Looks fantastic with jeans. It doesn’t have pockets, which I love because it give you a nice shape and silhouette without looking bulky.  It’s midi to long in terms of the length. I’m 5’6” and it hangs past my knees. I absolutely love it. Highly recommend. I just took it with me to Jackson Hole, Wyoming on vacation.

I ordered this in "A-black" which looked like it had nice, neutral khaki and light grey accent colors.  In person the colors were actually yellow and baby blue (see photo).  I knew right away that I was going to return it, so I did not take it any further out of the package and therefore can't comment on the fit or overall quality. But, it seemed nice except for the colors.
I thought the fabric would be better quality.

评论概述: Beautiful throw over for outings. In love!
评论详情: I bought the dark blue and red one and it is beautiful and vibrant. I was worried it was going to look like a rug on me, nope! Looks like grandma had kniffted me a lovely cardigan. I haven't worn it long enough to see how it'll last but so far quality is great. Id recommend a light cold wash on it and hang it dry as the material doesn't seem delicate but seems like it wouldn't do well if you washed and dryer it hot.

This sweater absolutely swallowed me. It's very boxy, too, with the shoulder seams hanging too far off onto the arm. I wanted to love it, but had to return it. It's just way too big and I'm already losing weight. Be sure to size down.

I didn’t realize this sweater did not have pockets. It would’ve been perfect otherwise. Super soft, really pretty and cozy. Such a bummer because it was so fabulous! I had to return it for that reason alone.
The sweater was so soft and very cute. I typically wear a large or extra large. I purchased an XL and it was mid like a 2XL.

The sweater arrived promptly.  It fits true to size (I bought XL which is what I usually wear).  As several others have said, the color is off.  It does have a nice rich brown color overall, but the color blocking is much more dull and not vibrant as shown in the picture mostly because IT IS SEWN INSIDE OUT. 评论概述: Ladies... this one checks all the boxes!

I love the colors, the warmth and all the compliments I get when wearing this sweater.
I love this sweater, not only is it warm and soft but it’s stylish too.

I ordered the brown one and am really pleased with the quality. It is very soft and feels good on, not an itchy kind of sweater. The colors are beautiful. I haven't experienced any shedding like some commenters. It looks more expensive than it is.
Ordered a medium, fits like a large but still like how soft and cozy it is.
I bought two of these and adore them both! The colors do look a little different in person, but I still really like it. They’re very soft!

I read the reviews and saw the pictures and was still worried this sweater would not live up to the hype. Let me tell you, it is absolutely perfect! It's soft, it's cozy, it doesn't smell bad.. the sleeves are super long, the colors are beautiful and the quality is wonderful. I am absolutely in love with this sweater and never want winter to end, haha. Truly tho, if you are on the fence, just treat yo'self and buy it. You will not regret it!! 😍
Super soft and colors are beautiful Small fits perfect

I was hesitant to purchase this due to the price and some of the reviews but am happy I did.  It’s very soft and has an almost angora feel to it. It looks just like the pictures and although the bottom hem does appear to possibly be inside out, it certainly still looks very pretty and I’m not convinced it’s unintentional. It fits very well, true to size, and is a good length. It is flattering and the colors are vibrant and pretty. Due to the angora-like quality, there is a slight bit of shedding on the brown style, but it did not get on my under shirt and I did not find it problematic. My only critique is that it is a bit static-y, which I believe is to be expected since it is acrylic. But it is warm and soft, so overall I am very happy with purchase. A unique, very boho vibe that I love. I would definitely recommend if the static issue is not a deal breaker. The tassels do stay put and are not getting attracted to the sweater, so it is fine by me. It’s really not bad.  It’s a nice long sweater that is true to the pictures and I would therefore recommend in brown. Not sure about the navy though as the shedding seems more noticeable in the pictures due to the dark color. But I did only purchase brown so I can’t speak on that for sure. Just my inclination from reading other reviews.

I liked the colors, size & length, but I had read a review that the tassels would easily tangle. This would have frustrated me after cleaning, so I returned. The quality of the material was not exactly what I was shopping for either, but that was a personal preference because I was comparing it to another garment I had tried on in a store that didn’t have my size.
Good quality vibrant colors

I got the black, super cute but runs huge. I normally wear 2X and the XL is huge. I’ll probably just return it instead of exchanging it because it’s longer and heavier than I thought it would be. It would be fine to use as a coat but too warm as a sweater.
Got this for my mom for Christmas and now I want one of my own!! So soft and beautiful. Originally ordered a large but it was a bit big so returned and got a medium. Perfect.

Never in all of my years of owning sweaters, have I had a sweater that sheds like this one. I have had to wash things twice to get all of the sweater fibers off. It is soft, I'll give it that (which only makes those little suckers stick to EVERYTHING). I shouldn't have bought it because I HATE collars like this, they roll weird, they show the seam, they sit wonky. But that is my fault, I should have looked closer. I got swept away by the length and the tassels. I had to wash and dry it to shrink it a little, it was bulky in the shoulders and body, and it did shrink and now fits well (disregarding the collar. Maybe I can tack it down with a couple of stitches? ). Anyway, it's just OK.
Very soft and comfortable. Many compliments.

评论概述: I bought as a gift and almost kept it
评论详情: I bought this for my 19 yr old daughter this Christmas. I felt like I needed one more gift for her after returning a gift I had previously bought her when I realized I already gave her the same thing last year 😐. Anyway, I took it out of the Amazon box to check it out and had to try it on…because as parents we do that for our kids. We try all their food before they eat it to make sure it isn’t poisoned and our older daughter’s sweaters on to make sure they aren’t not too itchy. Anyway, it’s not itchy at all and it’s so cute that I’m currently back on Amazon to buy myself one. It took a lot not to hang this one right up in my closet. Oh and my daughter loves it too. She loves it so much in fact, she forgot another sweater here when she left. And I’m currently wearing it while looking for that other sweater. It’s also cute but it’s itchy, so I might just keep it …for her sake.

I love this cardigan. Super warm and the fit is perfect. Will get more in different colors!
I like it. Pretty and comfortable. I like my sleeves to go over my my hand to the fingers. These sleeves show quite a bit of my wrist. A bit itchy.

It’s a nice sweater for $20. The problem is I spent $40 on it. Still, I like my Basic B sweater.

Flattering, love the look. Not too heavy, but still enough to keep you warm on a cool Fall day.

I just purchased this and wore it to work. It is very soft. I'm about 5.2 and it reaches below my knees. It more beautiful in person. I guess I am surprised at the quality of the material. I don't really wear coats due to the bulkiness, so I am a sweater person. This is warm for a low of approx 50 degrees as an outer wear. If your thinking about purchasing one, I would truly recommend this sweater.
